name: tetris
description: Tetris game monorepo (core engine + web app)

scripts.build: npm run --workspace @tetris/web build && npm run --workspace @tetris/core build
scripts.typecheck: npm run --workspace @tetris/core typecheck && npm run --workspace @tetris/web typecheck
scripts.lint: npm run --workspace @tetris/core lint && npm run --workspace @tetris/web lint
scripts.format: npm run --workspace @tetris/core format && npm run --workspace @tetris/web format
scripts.test: npm run --workspace @tetris/core test --silent && npm run --workspace @tetris/web test --silent
